Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core

Interface EventListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
ControllerListener, ViewListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI, Lobby, PreGameController, TurnController, VirtualView
public interface EventListener
Generic interface implemented by the classes that need to handle events.
